name: Stirge
description: A small, bat-like creature with a long, needle-like proboscis used for feeding on blood. It is often found in swamps, forests, or dark caves.
memorable: Stirges can swarm, attaching to larger creatures and draining their blood, which can be dangerous despite their small size.
goals: To drain blood from living creatures.
relations: Often encountered in groups; serves as a minor threat in ecosystems.
strengths: High agility and ability to drain blood from victims.
weaknesses: Very low hit points and strength, making them vulnerable to direct attacks.
attacks: Uses a proboscis to attach and drain blood, dealing damage over time.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Drain allows it to inflict significant damage while attached to larger creatures.
senses: Has darkvision with a range of 60 feet, allowing it to see in darkness.
additional_information: Capable of flying at 40 feet, which improves its mobility.
Drawn to the scent of blood, increasing its chances of ambush.
Can detach itself after draining a certain amount of blood.
Can redirect attacks using Reactive Wiggle when attached to prey.
Typically found in swarms, making them effective in larger numbers.
